alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Claiborne; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 30 at 11:31AM CDT until March 30 at 11:45AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WEBSTER...SOUTHWESTERN CLAIBORNE AND NORTH CENTRAL BIENVILLE PARISHES... At 1130 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Homer, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Minden, Sibley, Doyline, Dubberly, Dixie Inn, Gilark, Noles Landing, Holly Springs and Ada. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
